lead_paragraph: For a few glorious days, tiny Brazilian soccer team Chapecoense was the side of the moment, the latest in a string of sporting surprises in 2016.

headline.print_headline: Colombia-Cup Dream Turns to Nightmare for Brazil's Chapecoense
headline.main: Colombia-Cup Dream Turns to Nightmare for Brazil's Chapecoense
